item.description:
The American Cancer Society DetermiNation program has teamed up with the Manchester City Marathon as an official charity for the race on November 1. We are in need of volunteers to support our athletes who are participating in the race on behalf of the Society and working hard to raise money for this very worthy cause.

We are looking for a group of 10-12 volunteers to assist with runner packet assembly on the evening of Tuesday, October 27 from 6:00-8:30pm. Location is still TBD, but will be in the Manchester area.

If you are able to help with packet assembly, please RSVP "Yes" so that I can add you to the list!

Please email Holly.Randall@cancer.org or call 603.471.4124 if you need more information!

For more information on our program, visit our website:
http://determination....
item.name: Volunteer Opportunity With American Cancer Society
